description: Euler Search (Random Sampling) Optimization - Efficient broad spectrum testing
goal: Find optimal parameters with 70% fewer backtests than grid search

parameters.name: position_size_per_pair
parameters.description: Position size per pair - Euler will sample randomly across range

parameters.name: stop_loss_z
parameters.description: Stop loss Z-score threshold - Random sampling ensures broad coverage

parameters.name: max_holding_days
parameters.description: Maximum holding period - Will test diverse combinations

note: Euler search will test ~40 random combinations across the full parameter space instead of all 140. Typically finds near-optimal solutions in 30% of grid search time.
